name: FetchRoomRecordingRule
description: Returns a list of Recording Rules for the Room.

RoomSid.description: The SID of the Room resource where the recording rules to fetch apply.

$ul: **date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**room_sid**: The SID of the Room resource for the Recording Rules
**rules**: A collection of Recording Rules that describe how to include or exclude matching tracks for recording
